**"Cyber Sentinel"**: A predictive AI-powered system that utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze network traffic patterns, identify potential vulnerabilities, and proactively prevent cyber threats. The system would be integrated with the company's existing IT infrastructure, providing real-time monitoring and alerts to security teams. (Confidence score: 0.9)

**"SecureSphere"**: A blockchain-based secure data storage solution that utilizes decentralized architecture to safeguard sensitive company data. This would enable secure data sharing, collaboration, and compliance with regulatory requirements. SecureSphere would also provide an auditable trail of all data transactions, ensuring transparency and accountability. (Confidence score: 0.8)

**"Cyber Guardian"**: A human-centric, AI-assisted security solution that empowers employees to become the first line of defense against cyber threats. The system would provide personalized security awareness training, real-time threat intelligence, and a user-friendly interface for reporting suspicious activity. Cyber Guardian would foster a culture of security awareness within the organization. (Confidence score: 0.85)

**"Network Nexus"**: A cutting-edge, AI-driven network segmentation solution that dynamically adapts to changing network conditions, ensuring optimal security and performance. Network Nexus would utilize advanced analytics and machine learning to identify and isolate potential threats, reducing the attack surface and minimizing downtime. (Confidence score: 0.9)

**"Compliance Catalyst"**: A comprehensive, AI-powered compliance management solution that streamlines regulatory requirements, risk assessments, and incident response. Compliance Catalyst would provide a centralized platform for tracking and managing compliance obligations, enabling the company to stay ahead of evolving regulatory landscapes.
